Name: STM-46 Gen.2 4.6x30 carbine
Description: A modified PCC carbine with excellent performance already "out of the box", manufactured by Soyuz-TM Arms. Designed with the participation of world bronze medalist in Semi-Auto Rifle Vadim Mikhailov. Accuracy, speed, comfort of recoil.Modified to be Compatible with Glock 4.6x30 magazines.This modified variant also shoots slightly faster then a standard STM-9.
